extension.name: Twitter Followers Friends Module
extension.author: Theo van der Sluijs
extension.description: Show images of your twitter followers or friends

field.name: CONSUMER_KEY
field.label: Your Consumer key
field.description: Put in your consumer key id you are using on twitter.

field.name: CONSUMER_SECRET
field.label: Your Consumer secret
field.description: Put in your consumer secret id you are using on twitter.

field.name: REQUEST_TOKEN
field.label: Your Request token
field.description: Put in your request token id you are using on twitter.

field.name: REQUEST_TOKEN_SECRET
field.label: Your request token secret
field.description: Put in your request token secret id you are using on twitter.

field.name: TwitCount
field.label: Maximum Count
field.description: Maximum number your twitter friends/followers shown

field.name: TwitSize
field.label: Image Size
field.description: Pick a image size that is right for you

field.name: TwitCache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Pick a Caching time. If you have many visitors you really should use cache !

field.name: OpenLink
field.label: Open link in
field.description: It set's the opening of a link into the same browserpage or a (new) blank browserpage

field.name: RanLast
field.label: Display Order
field.description: Set's the display order or your friends/followers, random or last added
